title: PIGN c.776T>C (p.Phe259Ser) variant present in trans with a pathogenic variant for PIGN-congenital disorder of glycosylation: Bella-Noah syndrome
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Lyvia Neves Rebello Alves, Lívia Valle dos Santos Silveira, Raquel Silva dos Reis Trabach, Débora Dummer Meira, Eldamária de Vargas Wolfgramm dos Santos, Iúri Drumond Louro
